titles.title: SAFE HAUL Act
To amend title 49, United States Code, with respect to minimum levels of financial responsibility for the transportation of property, and for other purposes.
Safe And Fair Environment on Highways Achieved through Underwriting Levels Act
SAFE HAUL Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Safe And Fair Environment on Highways Achieved through Underwriting Levels Act or the SAFE HAUL Act
This bill revises certain minimum financial responsibility requirements for transporting property.
The bill increases from $750,000 to $4,532,550 (adjusted for inflation) the minimum level of financial responsibility sufficient to satisfy established liability coverage for motor carriers providing property transportation.
